last_episode_to_air.name: Elemental Battle! Ultimate Showdown!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bel’s preparing for his semi-final match against Pax, and this fierce battle is sure to remind everyone why they love Blading!

name: Beyblade Burst
original_name: ベイブレードバースト
overview: Middle schooler Valt Aoi, with his Beyblade Valtryek, faces off against friends, classmates and rivals to become the world's number one Blader.

seasons.name: Beyblade Burst
seasons.overview: With his Beyblade Valtryek, Beigoma Academy student Valt Aoi faces off against friends, classmates and rivals to become the world's number one Blader.

seasons.name: Evolution
seasons.overview: Scouted by a famous Spanish club, Valt Aoi heads to Spain. With their sights on the World League, he and his teammates face the European League first.

seasons.name: Turbo
seasons.overview: Yearning to earn the title of world blading champion, a novice competitor must harness his untamed potential through training and tournaments.

seasons.name: Rise
seasons.overview: After training with legendary Valt Aoi, Dante and his trusty Ace Dragon lead the next generation of Bladers to battle in Japan — Beyblade's birthplace.

seasons.name: Surge
seasons.overview: As two brothers train to become Beyblade legends, they start a Blading revolution that could topple the sport's ruling elite.

seasons.name: QuadDrive
seasons.overview: A tenacious boy hijacks the World Beyblade Battle Association's broadcast to challenge every Beyblader to battle him in the Dynamic Battle System.

seasons.name: QuadStrike
seasons.overview: The stage is set for a masquerade tournament, but the Dark Prince isn’t the only belle at this ball! Enter: the masked Blader known as ‘Quadra’. Wielding her elemental Bey, Lightning Pandora, Quadra has defeated every foe to come her way. Meanwhile, Quadra’s brother, Pax, is busy studying the elemental powers radiating from a series of mysterious ruins nearby. Bel might be the Dark Prince, but this adventure is full of even darker secrets!

episodes.name: Let's Go! Valtryek!
episodes.overview: After losing a school battle to his classmate Rantaro, Valt vows to work on his Blading fundamentals. His friend, Beyblade genius Shu, encourages him.

episodes.name: Kerbeus: Guard Dog of the Underworld!
episodes.overview: Valt is over the moon thanks to his tournament win, but Shu warns him that true greatness requires discipline. Rantaro challenges Valt to a rematch.

episodes.name: Blast Off! Rush Launch!
episodes.overview: Valt's battle against Ken Midori continues, with advancement in the tournament on the line. Meanwhile, Shu and Daigo face their first opponents.

episodes.name: Beyblade Club: Let's Get Started!
episodes.overview: After getting permission to start a Beyblade club at school, Valt has to get people to join. He and Rantaro battle to decide who will be club leader.

episodes.name: Into the Darkness! Dark Doomscizor!
episodes.overview: Claiming to be a fan of Valt's, Daigo challenges him to a friendly match that ends up not so friendly. Valt vows to practice his Rush Launch.

episodes.name: Get Ready! Crash Course
episodes.overview: Valt's mom Chiharu invents an at-home training program for him. Then it's time for the next battles in the district tournament, with Shu up first.

episodes.name: The Flash Launch! It's Crazy Fast!
episodes.overview: With another match coming up soon, Valt starts practicing his new special move, the Flash Launch. Wakiya asks Hoji to do something unsportsmanlike.

episodes.name: A Powerful Opponent! Hyper Horusood!
episodes.overview: With the fourth round of the district tournaments, Valt and Valtryek face off against Hoji and Horusood. Most expect Valt to lose, but not Shu.

episodes.name: Wyvron in the Way!
episodes.overview: Valt advances to the semi-finals along with Shu, Orochi and Wakiya. Not content to wait, Wakiya contrives to battle Valt at his family's mansion.

episodes.name: Get Over It! Trust in Valtryek!
episodes.overview: After the end of his battle with Wakiya, Valt's friends try to help him regain his love of Beyblade. Meanwhile, Shu gets some news from the doctor.

episodes.name: Spryzen's Despair!
episodes.overview: Shu struggles with his medical restrictions and Valt tries to cheer him up, with mixed results. Valt faces Wakiya again, this time in the tournament.

episodes.name: Shield Crash Menace!
episodes.overview: Valt's tournament match with Wakiya goes down to the wire as he keeps trying to achieve a burst finish and Shu waits to face Orochi.

episodes.name: Shu's Test!
episodes.overview: Shu's match against Orochi continues, with the moves putting increasing strain on Shu's shoulder. Whoever wins will face Valt in the final.

episodes.name: The Battle We Promised!
episodes.overview: Valt and Shu are slated to face each other in the final round of the tournament, but Shu's shoulder hurts and Valt is worried about him.

episodes.name: A Fierce Battle! Valtryek Versus Spryzen!
episodes.overview: The battle between Valt and Shu pits Valt's Flash Launch against Shu's new Upper Launch. When Shu takes the lead, Valt has no margin for error.

episodes.name: A Group Lesson! Shakadera Special!
episodes.overview: After the tournament, Valt and his friends follow Shu to Xander's family training ground. To battle Xander, Valt takes on his friend Yugo.

episodes.name: Extreme Xcalius!
episodes.overview: Xander and Xcalius battle Valt and Valtryek. Afterwards, Xander leads the group through an intense workout on the obstacle course.

episodes.name: Team Battle! It's Off the Hook!
episodes.overview: The club still has a chance to compete at nationals, and they return to Xander's for team battle training. First up, Daigo faces the mysterious Ukio.

episodes.name: Roktavor vs Unicrest!
episodes.overview: With Daigo defeated, Rantaro steps up to take on Ukio. He soon discovers that Ukio is holding back, but the team disagrees on what to do.

episodes.name: Bring It Together! Chain Launch!
episodes.overview: Ken's determination falters as he faces Ukio, but a pep talk from his teammates reminds him that he's not alone. Then it's time for the final battle.

episodes.name: A Battle of Friendship!
episodes.overview: The Beigoma team's battle against the Sword Flames continues, and now it's Valt's turn to face Xander in a three point match.

episodes.name: Valtryek Awakens!
episodes.overview: Invitations to the regionals are out, and the Beigomas and their classmates are in. Valt gets his first chance to meet Zac, the idol blader.

episodes.name: Lonely Doomscizor!
episodes.overview: After the qualifying rounds, Daigo is slated to face Yugo next in the tournament. Doing research on him presents Daigo with a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Full Strength, For Real!
episodes.overview: With the tournament approaching, Rantaro and Hoji find themselves sharing a practice space. When the tournament starts, Rantaro and Valt face off.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Masked Blader!
episodes.overview: Zac continues wandering around as the "Masked Blader." After meeting Toko and Nika, he challenges Wakiya to a battle -- an offer Wakiya can't refuse!

episodes.name: Let's Do This Thing!
episodes.overview: Daigo decides to quit the Bey Club to make amends for a mistake. Worried about his friend, Valt struggles to concentrate on his match with Orochi.

episodes.name: Training Camp! The Biting Stadium!
episodes.overview: Now that he and Shu have joined the Bey Club, Wakiya invites the other members to his country mansion, where they train in his custom Bey stadium.

episodes.name: Mountains! Rivers! A Huge Stormy Adventure!
episodes.overview: Training camp at Wakiya's mansion continues, complete with cooking duties. Everyone pitches in, but Toko and Nika get a little carried away.

episodes.name: Eye on the Prize!
episodes.overview: Valt agrees to take part in the opening ceremony for the National Tournament and meets Quon, a Blader friend of Xander's. Then Valtryek goes missing.

episodes.name: The Winged Snake! Quetziko!
episodes.overview: The national tournament kicks off with the Bey Club facing Quon's Ice Blaze team. First, Valt faces his new hero Quon himself.

episodes.name: Teachings of a Legend!
episodes.overview: The Bey Club takes a trip to the Beyblade Museum, and Ken tries to cheer Valt up. Then the tournament resumes with Zac's Superstars up next.

episodes.name: Cyclone Power!
episodes.overview: Zac throws a giant street party and invites the members of the Bey Club. Valt and Rantaro jump at the chance to try out the life-size Bey stadium.

episodes.name: Mega Flames! Dual Sabers!
episodes.overview: As the Bey Club faces off against the Sword Flames in the second round of the tournament, Wakiya challenges Valt's leadership as team captain.

episodes.name: The Beasts Bare Their Fangs!
episodes.overview: Shu experiments with ways to increase Spryzen's power. Valt and Ken practice together just like old times, but Ken wants to help his new team.

episodes.name: Primal Attack! Beast Betromoth!
episodes.overview: The team semi-finals pit the Bey Club against the Beasts. Wakiya faces off against Yoga Sakurajima while Valt battles Ben Azuki.

episodes.name: Rideout Rising!
episodes.overview: Orochi and Gabe face off to decide whose team moves on to the finals. Meanwhile, the Bey Club explains what they do for the video club's documentary.

episodes.name: Next Stop, Team Finals!
episodes.overview: With the final round of the tournament approaching, the Bey Club listens to Shu's advice and takes a day off from training. But relaxing isn't easy.

episodes.name: Battle to the Finish! Lost Lúinor
episodes.overview: The final round continues. When Lui Shirasagi takes the floor for the Rideouts, the Bey Club team argues over who will face him.

episodes.name: Into the Vortex! Lost Spiral!
episodes.overview: Valt's battle with Lui continues, and the pressure is getting to him. Meanwhile, Shu can't help but recall the last time he faced Lui himself.

episodes.name: All In! Going Solo!
episodes.overview: With the team finals over, Valt turns his mind to the upcoming individual rounds. To gain an edge, he starts working with Bey scientist Naoki Minamo.

episodes.name: Nepstrius' Trap!
episodes.overview: Valt's first opponent in the individual rounds is Naoki, who plans to use the data he collected during their research against him.

episodes.name: Jumbo Jormuntor! The Venomous Snake!
episodes.overview: The tournament continues, and Shu now faces Jin Aizawa, with Naoki observing eagerly. To win, Shu needs to take a calculated risk.

episodes.name: Winged Launch!
episodes.overview: Wakiya declares his intention of quitting the Bey Club, and Shu proposes separate training. When the tournament resumes, Valt faces Quon again.

episodes.name: Roar! Battle of the Beasts!
episodes.overview: Teammates Ken and Ben face off against each other in the individual matches. Out of mutual respect, neither of them holds anything back.

episodes.name: Spryzen vs. Wyvron
episodes.overview: Wakiya and Shu finally face each other again, this time at the national tournament. Only one of them can advance, and it's all on the line.

episodes.name: Battle for the Top! Valt vs Xander!
episodes.overview: Scheduled to face each other in the third round of the tournament, Valt and Xander train hard with their teammates before stepping into the ring.

episodes.name: Star Battle!
episodes.overview: Akira's dreams come true when he faces Zac the Sunrise in the third round of the tournament in a star-powered battle to the finish.

episodes.name: Semi-Finals! Spin Versus Speed!
episodes.overview: The semi-finals begin with Valt and Zac facing off against each other in a classic underdog versus fan favorite matchup. It's the moment of truth.

episodes.name: Old Rivals! Lui Versus Shu!
episodes.overview: As the semi-finals continue, it's Spin Emperor versus Spin Emperor when Shu and Lui face each other in their first match since the last tournament.

episodes.name: Overthrowing the King!
episodes.overview: There's just one match left in the national tournament. The Bey Club members train with Valt to help him practice a new move he's been working on.

episodes.name: Final Showdown! Victory Valtryek!
episodes.overview: Valt's match with Lui comes down to the final rounds. With everything on the line, it's time to find out how far Valt and Valtryek have come.

1.name: Beyblade Burst
1.overview: With his Beyblade Valtryek, Beigoma Academy student Valt Aoi faces off against friends, classmates and rivals to become the world's number one Blader.

episodes.name: Fresh Start! Valtryek's Evolution!
episodes.overview: Valt arrives in Barcelona, where he meets a junior BC Sol player Kit Lopez and a BeyTrainer named Raul.

episodes.name: Fighting Spirit! Berserk Roktavor!
episodes.overview: Since he missed his first day at BC Sol, Valt has to battle for the one remaining slot on the roster. His opponent is his old friend Rantaro!

episodes.name: Drain Fafnir! Winding Up!
episodes.overview: BC Sol holds internal tryouts to select their squad against Sunbat United. To represent the club, they'll have to defeat team captain Free De La Hoya.

episodes.name: Whirlwind! Tempest Wyvron!
episodes.overview: The match against Sunbat United starts, and Valt and Rantaro get the nod for BC Sol. They find themselves facing a familiar face.

episodes.name: Surprise Attack! Kinetic Satomb!
episodes.overview: BC Sol and Sunbat United continue their face off. Valt and Silas show how much they've evolved since their last match.

episodes.name: Squad Shake Up!
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the match with Sunbat United, BC Sol shakes up its A-team roster. Silas and Django each make a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Journey to the Top!
episodes.overview: Stan blames Valt for Django's decision. Despite tensions on the team, it's soon time for tryouts for the European League.

episodes.name: Season Opener! European League!
episodes.overview: The European League kicks off with BC Sol facing German team Top Wand. Valt makes a new friend, Cuza, but soon winds up facing him in the arena.

episodes.name: Alter Cognite! The Shape Shifter!
episodes.overview: With BC Sol and Top Wand tied, Valt and Cuza face off for a rematch. Meanwhile, Theodore Glass continues to try and recruit Free to his team.

episodes.name: Free to Launch!
episodes.overview: BC Sol's victory only brings more tension. Silas wants more play time, resentment towards Valt and Rantaro grows, and then Free makes an announcement.

episodes.name: BC Sol! A Team Divided!
episodes.overview: With Free gone, Valt and Rantaro are promoted to BC Sol's first string for their matches against the Swedish team, but thing's don't go well.

episodes.name: The Return of Doomscizor!
episodes.overview: BC Sol faces French team AS Gallus. Valt and Rantaro get thrown off the roster when they’re caught talking with Daigo, a player on the opposing team.

episodes.name: Twin Scythes! Double Strike!
episodes.overview: Back on the A squad, Valt faces his old friend Daigo in two intense matches. They've both come a long way from Beigoma Academy Bey Club.

episodes.name: Attack! Maximus Garuda!
episodes.overview: The European League matches continue and BC Sol faces off against the Royals, whose star player has a grudge against Silas.

episodes.name: Ghasem! The Airborne Blader!
episodes.overview: After Valt and Rantaro's matches, Ghasem and Silas face each other again. Meanwhile, Valt receives some disturbing news about an old friend.

episodes.name: The Search for Shu!
episodes.overview: Valt, Rantaro, Daigo and Wakiya head to Mexico, where Shu went missing. After meeting up with Cuza, they learn about the Snake Pit Organization.

episodes.name: Shadow Magic! The Snake Pit!
episodes.overview: Still inside the Snake Pit, Valt and his friends face the masked Shadow Bladers, who somehow have Beys exactly like their own!

episodes.name: The Underground Maze
episodes.overview: Valt and his friends take on the Snake Pit's Bladers: a psychic, an acrobat, and an arctic aficionado. To find Shu, they all have to win!

episodes.name: Secret Fire! Red Eye!
episodes.overview: Azure Eye is a powerful opponent, but Valt's learning fast. Then he and his friends face Red Eye and Violet Eye in a battle royal!

episodes.name: New Teammates! New Rivals!
episodes.overview: Back in Spain, BC Sol starts training for the World League, but some of the Bladers aren't happy when an old friend arrives.

episodes.name: Joshua vs. the Space Ninjas!
episodes.overview: Famous actor and Big Five Blader Joshua Burns arrives to film his new movie, and Valt, Rantaro and Cuza are cast as the villainous Space Ninjas!

episodes.name: Blast Jinnius! Caller of Storms!
episodes.overview: Shooting for the movie continues, but Wakiya has his sights set on fighting Joshua for real stakes, not just on the set.

episodes.name: Infinity Stadium! Raul's Challenge!
episodes.overview: BC Sol needs a new trainer. When they find a seasoned veteran, he's invited for a trial period, but Kris has some family history with him.

episodes.name: World League! Setting the Stage!
episodes.overview: The World League is about to begin, and everyone is busy with their final preparations. Joshua reveals his reason for joining the Raging Bulls.

episodes.name: Showdown! Surge Xcalius!
episodes.overview: Valt receives an unexpected letter from Xander, who's in Brazil working towards earning a spot on the highly esteemed SB Rios.

episodes.name: Genesis Reboot!
episodes.overview: BC Sol and the Royals face each other in a rematch for the ages. With help from Rickson and Raul, Valt trains to master his Genesis Reboot move.

episodes.name: Worlds Collide! Home Turf!
episodes.overview: The next World League battle, between SB Rios and Sunbat United, is scheduled for Japan! Which means Valt and his friends get to go home for a visit.

episodes.name: Vampire! Deep Caynox!
episodes.overview: Valt and his friends head to France to cheer Daigo and his team on in the big showdown between AC Gallus and BC Galleon.

episodes.name: The Fortress! Shelter Regulus!
episodes.overview: For their battle against SB Rios, BC Sol head to Brazil, where they get into some trouble at the Bey Carnival.

episodes.name: Collision Course! To the Finals!
episodes.overview: The semi-finals begin, with BC Sol facing SB Rios and AS Gallus battling the Raging Bulls. With advancement on the line, no one's holding back!

episodes.name: Big 5! Breaking Through!
episodes.overview: Valt and his friends are still battling for a place in the finals. Both Cuza and Valt face off against Ren Wu, one of the elite Big 5 Bladers.

episodes.name: Unrivaled! Triple Saber!
episodes.overview: Daigo and Joshua Burns battle for a spot in the finals and Xander faces his ultimate rival, Valt. Everything is riding on these matches!

episodes.name: The World League Final!
episodes.overview: The World League finals begin at last, with BC Sol facing off against the Raging Bulls. Lui is only one of many familiar faces making a reappearance!

episodes.name: Full Power! Spring Attack!
episodes.overview: The battles continue, and the tension is rising. With the final match looming, Free faces Silas while Valt goes up against Joshua.

episodes.name: To the Podium!
episodes.overview: The World League final's final match: Silas versus Joshua, BC Sol versus the Raging Bulls. After all their hard work, there can only be one winner!

episodes.name: Lúinor vs. Spryzen!
episodes.overview: Red Eye returns to stake his claim as the ultimate Blader, accepting a match against Lui. Red Eye's secret identity is revealed, shocking everyone.

episodes.name: Challenge of Champions!
episodes.overview: A new global Blading tournament is announced: the International Blader's Cup! He's already qualified, but Valt vows to train even harder than ever.

episodes.name: Requiem Project! Spryzen Unleashed!
episodes.overview: Free returns to BC Sol, but not all of his former teammates are ready to bury the hatchet. Shu is overtaken by a mysterious power.

episodes.name: Emperor of the Underground!
episodes.overview: The International Blader's Cup is about to begin, but Valt and Kit get distracted by a shady underground arena where fierce Bladers compete.

episodes.name: Bow Down! Boom Khalzar!
episodes.overview: The Cup kicks off with Valt chosen to face off against Kurt in an epic battle for the ages.

episodes.name: Colossus Hammer! Twin Noctemis!
episodes.overview: The battles for the Cup continue, with the Snake Pit alumni squaring off against each other. Boa faces Shu, then Norman battles Clio and Cuza.

episodes.name: BC Sol Scorcher!
episodes.overview: Wakiya's suspicions about the Cup grow while the battles rage on. Silas prepares a new technique as Valt and Cuza square off.

episodes.name: White Hot Rivals!
episodes.overview: Shu and Kurt battle for victory while Joshua prepares to fight Free once again as the winners rise and the losers continue to fall.

episodes.name: Epic Evolution! Strike Valtryek!
episodes.overview: The leaderboards aren’t looking too great for BC Sol's Bladers. To survive the next round, Valt, Silas and Cuza will have to level up or go home!

episodes.name: Spryzen the Destroyer!
episodes.overview: In the fourth round, Valt finally faces his former best friend Shu and his infamous Bey, Requiem Spryzen. Valt will have to give it his all to win.

episodes.name: No Limits! Free vs. Lui!
episodes.overview: In the wake of his match with Shu, Free tells Valt about a dangerous new training method before facing Lui.

episodes.name: Full Force! Charging Up!
episodes.overview: Free and Lui's battle concludes, and Norman and Shu face each other in a Snake Pit rematch. Valt faces Boa for a chance to advance to the next round.

episodes.name: Teamwork! To the Semi-Finals!
episodes.overview: Cuza and Valt each face off against the Emperor himself: Kurt! Boa decides to leave the Snake Pit, but not before telling Valt a shocking secret.

episodes.name: The Fierce Four!
episodes.overview: Four Bladers advance to the semi-finals of the International Blader's Cup. Shu faces off against Lui, while Valt prepares for his match against Free.

episodes.name: Breaking Point! Bursting Through!
episodes.overview: After his match with Free, Valt's family and friends come to cheer him on for the final round of the tournament: a rematch against his oldest friend.

episodes.name: A Champion Is Crowned!
episodes.overview: Valt faces Shu one last time, with everything on the line: the title of World's Strongest Blader, his pride and his friend's very soul. Let it rip!

2.name: Evolution
2.overview: Scouted by a famous Spanish club, Valt Aoi heads to Spain. With their sights on the World League, he and his teammates face the European League first.

episodes.name: Time To Go Turbo!
episodes.overview: Reigning World Champion Valt Aoi meets promising newcomer Aiger Akabane on his journey to upgrade Valtryek to Turbo Bey status.

episodes.name: Achilles vs Forneus!
episodes.overview: Aiger transfers to Beigoma Academy with hopes of unseating Valt's successor, Fubuki Sumiye.

episodes.name: Duel at Sunset!
episodes.overview: Aiger faces a challenge from the leader of the notorious Wild Bey Gang, Ranjiro Kiyama.

episodes.name: Land It! Z Breaker!
episodes.overview: Valt defends his World Champion title against Kurt Baratier; meanwhile, Aiger and Fubuki have a rematch.

episodes.name: Turbo Match! Valtryek vs Lúinor!
episodes.overview: Before the title match between Valt and Lui, Aiger demands his own battle with the Winter Knight.

episodes.name: Winter Knight! Battle Royale!
episodes.overview: A new tournament is announced with a prize too good for Aiger and team to pass up: a chance to battle Lui Shirosagi!

episodes.name: Curtains Rise! The Lúinor Cup!
episodes.overview: After proving his brute strength, Aiger takes on the Bey Club's power Blader Koji Konda as the the Lúinor Cup begins.

episodes.name: Transformation! Heat Salamander!
episodes.overview: Aiger receives an unexpected challenge from Suoh and his new Turbo Bey, Heat Salamander.

episodes.name: Swirling Inferno!
episodes.overview: It's a Bey Club brawl in the Luinor Cup, when Toko faces off against the swirling inferno that is Suoh.

episodes.name: Achilles vs Roktavor!
episodes.overview: A misunderstanding has the gang chasing after Hae-jin. Aiger and Ranjiro duke it out in the next round of the Lúinor Cup.

episodes.name: Battle of Betrayal!
episodes.overview: It's hard work vs natural genius as Fubuki faces off against an old friend in the semifinals of the Lúinor Cup.

episodes.name: Bull's-eye! Archer Hercules!
episodes.overview: While Aiger is excited to face off against his friend, Hae-jin is torn between blading and archery.

episodes.name: Lúinor Cup! Final Battle!
episodes.overview: The Lúinor Cup finals have finally arrived! Suoh and Aiger are worried about the arrival of two new mysterious Bladers.

episodes.name: Raging Dragon! Brutal Lúinor!
episodes.overview: Aiger's got some training to do with Cap'n and Hae-jin, but first, he must deal with a strange fortune teller.

episodes.name: Trial By Fire! Defeat Lui!
episodes.overview: The time has arrived: it's Aiger vs. Lui! Just when their battle can't get any more epic, Aiger suffers a major setback when an unexpected face appears.

episodes.name: Epic Voyage! Battleship Cruise!
episodes.overview: Aiger, Hae-jin, and Cap'n hop aboard the Battleship Cruise! On board, Aiger faces off members of the Turbo 4 which is set to be his hardest challenge yet!

episodes.name: Sword of the Legendary Hero!
episodes.overview: An apprentice of the one-and-only Xander Shakadera is searching for his true rival and will take on anyone who stands in his path!

episodes.name: Ghost Ship! Adventure on the High Seas!
episodes.overview: An abandoned ship appears out of the mists and a mysterious figure lurks in the shadows, watching the Blader's every move.

episodes.name: Super Rumble! Beyathlon!
episodes.overview: The crew is joined by the strange, masked Blader they met aboard the ghost ship. Meanwhile, the ever-mysterious Phi further reveals the astonishing powers of Phoenix.

episodes.name: Explosive Flames! Revive Phoenix!
episodes.overview: Aiger's search for Fubuki leads him to the gym of the world-renowned Raging Bulls! The gang gets a taste of Phi's true power as a new Blader arrives on the Battleship Cruise.

episodes.name: Cooperation! Tag-Team Battle!
episodes.overview: The Bladers get a chance at redemption with a tag-team battle, but some Bladers must work with their enemies if they want to stay aboard!

episodes.name: Three-Way Stand-Off!
episodes.overview: With only one star left, Ranjiro, Suoh, and Hae-jin must put it all on the line to stay in the competition!

episodes.name: Operation: Protect the Bey Stars!
episodes.overview: The Bladers left aboard must make every launch count if they're going to keep their Bey stars!

episodes.name: Achilles vs Xcalius!
episodes.overview: Aiger, Xavier, and Laban take off on a kayak race, but get stranded on a deserted island!

episodes.name: Super Dragon! Geist Fafnir!
episodes.overview: The crew heads to El Astro-home of world-famous BC Sol! Aiger finds Free De La Hoya and challenges him to a battle.

episodes.name: Battleship Cruise! Final Voyage!
episodes.overview: After saying goodbye to Xavier, only four Bladers are left in the competition!

episodes.name: Road to Glory!
episodes.overview: Aiger needs to up his game to have any chance of becoming world champion. Luckily, Xavier introduces Aiger to the perfect teacher: Xander Shakadera!

episodes.name: Valt vs Aiger!
episodes.overview: After all the battles and training, it's finally time for Aiger to take on Valt Aoi!

episodes.name: Dark Prince! Dread Hades!
episodes.overview: After a heart-stopping showdown, Aiger comes face-to-face with a terrifying new foe.

episodes.name: Aiger Goes Wild!
episodes.overview: As Hyde's predicted victory looms closer, it looks like Aiger might lose his title as quickly as he won it.

episodes.name: Rebirth! Turbo Valtryek!
episodes.overview: Kyle takes his shot against the famous Free De La Hoya and finally reveals what's behind the mask! Meanwhile, Valt seeks to re-forge his partner into Turbo Valtryek!

episodes.name: Dread Tower! The Dark Citadel!
episodes.overview: Aiger and Ranjiro arrive at the Dread Tower, but with Hyde calling the shots, nothing is as it seems. The notorious Bey-burglar, Count Nightfell, makes a grand entrance.

episodes.name: Trapped In the Dread Tower!
episodes.overview: Aiger and Ranjiro find themselves in a sticky situation when they face off against the enigmatic Dr. Evel!

episodes.name: Secret of the Fused Bey!
episodes.overview: Having discovered the fruits of Dr. Evel's Blading research, Count Nightfell challenges Aiger to a friendly match.

episodes.name: Spirit of Flame! Turbo Spryzen!
episodes.overview: Fubuki and the legendary Shu Kurena show up at the Dread Tower! Shu is determined to show Aiger where true strength comes from, just as Valt once showed him.

episodes.name: The Darkness Within!
episodes.overview: The Hyde show continues as Aiger finally gets his long-awaited rematch. But the battles don't stop there; former and current World Champions go head-to-head!

episodes.name: Turbo Clash! Showdown at the Dark Citadel!
episodes.overview: Valt clashes with Hyde in a Dread Tower showdown. Frustrated by his earlier loss to Hyde, Aiger storms out of the match and runs into Phi.

episodes.name: Rebirth! Turbo Achilles!
episodes.overview: With a little help from Shu Kurenai, Aiger returns home to forge his new Bey: Turbo Achilles! Meanwhile, Fubuki and Ranjiro return to Beigoma Academy.

episodes.name: Aiger’s Rematch! Unbreakable Bond!
episodes.overview: An old friend arrives in town: the Master of the Wind, Kit Lopez! With Aiger struggling to perfect his Turbo Awakening, Kit helps him come up with a Plan B to take Hyde down.

episodes.name: Master of the Wind! Air Knight!
episodes.overview: Achilles enters the Turbo Awakened state against Hyde and Hades. Aiger has to deepen his bond with Achilles if he wants to stand a chance against the Master of Wind, Kit Lopez.

episodes.name: Hyde vs Phi!
episodes.overview: Phi challenges Hyde to a battle, intent on taking back what's his. Pushed beyond the breaking point, Hyde faces losing everything to his vengeful twin!

episodes.name: Battle Royale! Beyblade Heroes!
episodes.overview: Principal Shinoda surprises Beigoma Academy with a new Turbo Stadium. Aiger questions his own progress, when Toko sets out to prove that he's more than just Valt's little brother!

episodes.name: Lord of Destruction! Dread Phoenix!
episodes.overview: Phi gets the perfect opportunity to introduce the world to his new ultimate Bey when he challenges Free De La Hoya. Free must fight for the future of Blading as he knows it!

episodes.name: Turbo Training! Xavier's Kingdom!
episodes.overview: Aiger's training adventure begins in the kingdom ruled by his rival Xavier Bogard, who offers some intense training to help Aiger overcome his self-doubt!

episodes.name: Turbo Training! Survival on the Savanna!
episodes.overview: Aiger's training journey takes him to Africa where his old friend, wild child Laban Vanot, teaches Aiger the importance of using his concentration and senses!

episodes.name: Take Flight! Aerial Showdown!
episodes.overview: Aiger realizes that to stand a chance at winning a battle against Valt, he must first prove himself against the wind maven, Kit Lopez!

episodes.name: Spirit of Flame vs Lord of Destruction!
episodes.overview: Shu believes it's his duty to stop the terrifying Phi once and for all! But can he end the match before Dread Phoenix can use its ultimate weapon?

episodes.name: Blading Together! Turbo Awakening!
episodes.overview: As Aiger trains for his battle against Phi, Toko unites the Bey Club and the Wild Bey Gang to try and find Phi's weakness. Aiger's going to need everyone's help for this showdown!

episodes.name: Aiger vs Phi!
episodes.overview: Aiger fears that Phi may once again succeed in destroying Achilles by a Burst Finish. Will all of his training come undone before the battle even begins?

episodes.name: Aiger's Turbo Resonance!
episodes.overview: With the score stuck at 0-0 and the crowd on his side, Aiger follows his intuition and listens to Achilles in this final epic encounter!

episodes.name: Bonding! Aiger vs Valt!
episodes.overview: Aiger reflects on his bond with Achilles and his rivalry with Valt. As strong as he's become, Aiger will still have to step it up if he's going to take on the World Champ!

3.name: Turbo
3.overview: Yearning to earn the title of world blading champion, a novice competitor must harness his untamed potential through training and tournaments.

episodes.name: Ace Dragon! On the Rise!
episodes.overview: After training with Valt Aoi, Dante Koryu is ready to take on the world with his new Bey, Ace Dragon!

episodes.name: Abracadabra! Wizard Fafnir!
episodes.overview: Dante stumbles upon a high-tech gym run by the Spark Wings. One battle is all it takes to show why this club, and their leader Fumiya Kindo, are the Victories' biggest rivals!

episodes.name: Dragon vs Fafnir!
episodes.overview: In an attempt to humiliate the Victories, Fumiya challenges Dante to a battle that will be broadcast around the country.

episodes.name: Inspiration! Challenging Valt!
episodes.overview: Valt Aoi visits Dante for a friendly battle before opening the Bey Carnival. The Victories will need to get the hang of the Hyper Stadium if they hope to win.

episodes.name: All-In! Judgement Joker!
episodes.overview: As the Bey Carnival heats up, Arman and Ashindra take the stage against Joe Lazure and Joker.

episodes.name: The Final Hand!
episodes.overview: In the Bey Carnival semifinals, Dante clashes with Joe while Fumiya goes up against Lodin. The battles have never been wilder and the stakes have never been higher!

episodes.name: Bey Carnival! Epic Final!
episodes.overview: At last, the final match of the Bey Carnival is here! If Dante wants to beat elite athlete Lodin Haijima, he'll need to make his launch way more powerful!

episodes.name: Dante vs Delta!
episodes.overview: Dante and Delta are finally going head-to-head. Dante's excited to battle his friend, but Delta is disappointed by Dante's performance.

episodes.name: Flying High! Harmony Pegasus!
episodes.overview: Tango decides to take the Victories on a training journey to battle more powerful Bladers. While Dante meets with the mysterious Pheng Hope, Delta challenges the artistic Blindt DeVoy.

episodes.name: Flash of Light! Shining Crux!
episodes.overview: Delta and Blindt decide who'll walk away the victor, while Pheng takes the Victories back to his temple so that Arman can make good on his promise.

episodes.name: Battle in the Skies!
episodes.overview: Dante challenges Pheng to a rematch. After the battle, the gang heads to Battle Island to compete in a Blading circuit.

episodes.name: Spin! Advance! Survive!
episodes.overview: Dante takes on a member of the Risen 3 on his first roll in the Blading circuit. Meanwhile, Arman is already ahead of the pack.

episodes.name: The Final Stage! Facing Aiger!
episodes.overview: The race to face-off against world champion Aiger Akabane is drawing to a close as Dante, Arman, and Delta all hurtle towards their final goal.

episodes.name: Shining Bright! Hyper-Flux!
episodes.overview: Aiger Akabane proves his strength as the reigning World Champ. Does Dante have what it takes to stage a comeback?

episodes.name: Invasion! The New King!
episodes.overview: A enigmatic Blader throws Delta's match into disarray!

episodes.name: Rebirth! Command Dragon!
episodes.overview: In the wake of a devastating defeat at the hands of Arthur, Dante struggles to rebuild Dragon. Meanwhile, an inquisitive newcomer named Gwyn takes an interest in Dante.

episodes.name: Genesis in Motion!
episodes.overview: The Victories arrive at the Infernal Tower, ready to take on Apocalypse. But if they want to face Arthur, Gwyn has to defeat Joe and Joker in his first ever battle.

episodes.name: Dragon vs Apocalypse!
episodes.overview: Dante's ready to take Arthur down! But, with only one night to prepare a strategy, has he trained enough?

episodes.name: Put to the Test! Unburstable Bey!
Dragon vs Genesis!
episodes.overview: While Dante gets the hero's treatment after defeating Arthur, Delta contemplates leaving the Blading world altogether.

episodes.name: Rebirth! Master Devolos!
episodes.overview: Determined to redeem himself against Arthur, Delta returns to the Infernal Tower for one last showdown.

episodes.name: Ultimate Creation! Eclipse Genesis!
episodes.overview: When Arthur comes to the Blading District to recruit Gwyn, he gets a first hand look at the new Genesis!

episodes.name: Shining Ashindra!
episodes.overview: Training with Delta is helping Arman connect with Ashindra. Will it be enough to help them enter Hyper-Flux?

episodes.name: Dragon's Ultimate Awakening!
episodes.overview: Arman's already lost a match; can Dante turn things around for the Victories when he faces Gwyn?

episodes.name: Rising Ferocity! Tag Battle!
episodes.overview: The Victories have won their first match! Their second wind comes just as they enter the tag battles!

episodes.name: The Greatest Tag Battle Ever!
episodes.overview: The Victories are only one loss away from total defeat. It's time for Dante and Delta to combine their forces and rise up!

episodes.name: Rising Friendship! Master Dragon!
episodes.overview: The Victories and Inferno are tied going into the final round. Win or lose, it all comes down to this.

4.name: Rise
4.overview: After training with legendary Valt Aoi, Dante and his trusty Ace Dragon lead the next generation of Bladers to battle in Japan — Beyblade's birthplace.

episodes.name: The Blading Revolution (1)
episodes.overview: The Hizashi brothers are ready to join a new Blading revolution! But before these two can take on Beyblade's biggest legends, they must create Lightning Beys of their very own.

episodes.name: Locked On! Lightning Launch! (1)
episodes.overview: Rantaro Kiyama has been asked to coach the Comets and teache Hyuga and Hikaru what Beyblade is all about.

episodes.name: Persistence! Kolossal Strike! (1)
episodes.overview: Granted official access to the National Training Center, Hyuga and Hikaru work hard to become A-Rank Bladers in time for the upcoming Legend Festival.

episodes.name: Listen to Your Bey's Voice! (1)
episodes.overview: Hyuga and Hikaru focus on forging connections with their Beys. To help them, Valt and Rantaro take them to meet a mysterious Blader.

episodes.name: Illusory Dragon! Mirage Fafnir! (1)
episodes.overview: After their loss to Free De La Hoya, Hikaru and Hyuga decide to follow the Blading Legend's training regimen to learn the secrets behind his success.

episodes.name: Dream Team! Tag Battle! (1)
episodes.overview: Arriving back in Japan, the brothers learn that spots in the Legend Festival are filling up fast. In order to rank up, Rantaro takes them to face a Beyblade ogre!

episodes.name: Conquering the Ogre's Dungeon! (1)
episodes.overview: Hyuga and Hikaru were no match for the legendary Blader Lui Shirosagi, but before the brothers can face Lui again, they have to conquer the Ogre's Dungeon.

episodes.name: The Jet-Black Sun! Vex Lucius! (1)
episodes.overview: Lain's Blading prowess seems to be the stuff of myth. But that doesn't matter to Hyugu - he's ready to go head-to-head anyway!

episodes.name: Is This a Dream?! Or Is It a Nightmare?! (1)
episodes.overview: While everyone's prepping for the Legend Festival, another hyperactive Blader rises up to challenge Hikaru and Hyuga!

episodes.name: Is This a Dream?! Or Is It a Nightmare?! (2)
Rise to Victory! Triumph Dragon! (1)
episodes.overview: Dante Koryu is itching to battle the Hizashi brothers, and Hyuga is up first!

episodes.name: The Great Revolution! Legend Festival! (1)
episodes.overview: With the curtains finally open on the Legend Festival, Blading legends and challengers alike are gathered for the ultimate showdown.

episodes.name: Hyuga and Lain vs Hikaru and Aiger! (1)
episodes.overview: Participants in the Legend Festival are off to compete in the second stage! Next up is a series of team battles starting with Hyuga and Lain taking on Hikaru and Aiger!

episodes.name: Hyuga and Lain vs. Hikaru and Aiger! (2)
A True Hero! Tag Battle Style! (1)
episodes.overview: When Hikaru and Rantaro go up against Dante and Lui, one thing is clear: they'd better hope their teamwork is enough to win!

episodes.name: A True Hero! Tag Battle Style! (2)
Gotta Win! Going All-Out! (1)
episodes.overview: Legends and challengers alike are going all-out for a chance to show everyone what they can really do. All eyes are on Hyuga and Valt as they take on Free and Lui to do just that.

episodes.name: Defeat Valt! (1)
episodes.overview: With his semi-final match against Valt approaching fast, Hyuga hardly has any time left to prepare! Luckily, Hikaru comes to the rescue with a training strategy.

episodes.name: Grand Finale! Valt vs. Lain! (1)
episodes.overview: With Lain's Flare growing stronger, it looks like Valt's the only one who can take him down. There's no telling what the future holds as challenger and Legend go head-to-head.

episodes.name: Spirit of Fire! World Spryzen! (1)
episodes.overview: It seems like no one can stop Lain! That is, until Shu steps in. Can Shu reach Lain before he's swallowed up by his Flare, or will Lain carry out his vow and defeat his mentor?

episodes.name: Spirit of Fire! World Spryzen (2)
episodes.overview: Lain's getting so strong it seems like no one can stop him, except for Shu.

episodes.name: Counterattack! Lucius Endbringer! (1)
episodes.overview: Frustrated by his loss to Shu, Lain evolves Lucius and challenges Shu to a rematch. How will Spryzen hold up against the evolved Lucius Endbringer?

episodes.name: Tag-Team! Ultimate Partner! (1)
episodes.overview: It's time to pair up for the Ultimate Tag Series! Hikaru's set on teaming up with Aiger, while Hyuga's raring to battle alongside Valt.

episodes.name: Raging Battle! Defeating the Storm! (1)
episodes.overview: The tag-teams are set for the Ultimate Tag Series. While Dante and Lui clash with Valt and Honcho, Hikaru and Hyuga learn that the Blading legends are full of surprises.

episodes.name: Crash and Clash! Battle of Legends! (1)
episodes.overview: The Hizashi brothers are up against some of the strongest Bladers ever, and if they want to win, they'll need to work together!

episodes.name: Crash and Clash! Battle of Legends! (2)
Friendly Fire? Final Limit Breaker! (1)
episodes.overview: Tension starts to brew between Lain and Shu. Meanwhile, Wakiya invites the Hizashi brothers over for an unconventional meet-up with some other Bladers.

episodes.name: Scorching Battle! Dauntless Bravery! (1)
episodes.overview: With Round 4 wrapping up fast, Lain and Shu are just one win away from securing their place in the finals!

episodes.name: We Can Do It! Or Maybe Not! (1)
episodes.overview: In Round 5, Hyuga and Hikaru are going up against Free and Silas.

episodes.name: We Can Do It! Or Maybe Not! (2)
Confidence! Cowardice? Carefree-ness?! (1)
episodes.overview: As the Ultimate Tag Series hits the semi-finals, Hyuga and Hikaru go up against the legendary Valt Aoi and Rantaro Kiyama.

episodes.name: Revolution! The Final Showdown! (1)
episodes.overview: The finale of the Ultimate Tag Series is here, and no one can look away for a second! Hyuga and Hikaru might just have what it takes to defeat Lain and Shu.

5.name: Surge
5.overview: As two brothers train to become Beyblade legends, they start a Blading revolution that could topple the sport's ruling elite.

episodes.name: The Dark Prince! And Destruction Belfyre! (1)
episodes.overview: Bashara and Hanna investigate the creepy mansion near their home. Inside, the siblings come face to face with the Dark Prince, Bel Daizora. Bel challenges Bashara to a battle.

episodes.name: The Dark Prince! And Destruction Belfyre! (2)
Graveyard of Beys! Phantom's Gate! (1)
episodes.overview: Bashara is determined to battle the Dark Prince again, but Ranzo Kiyama arrives with a similar goal in mind. Bashara and Ranzo team up and challenge the Dark Prince.

episodes.name: Changing Modes! Highs and Lows! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel challenges Ranzo to anything - eating, dishwashing or whatever they're doing! Ranzo swears he won't go home until he defeats Bel, and at this rate, he might never leave.

episodes.name: Theater of the Abyss! Bel vs Valt! (1)
episodes.overview: Ranzo will only leave Phantom's Gate once he has defeated Bel. Valt Aoi arrives at the Theater of the Abyss to challenge the Dark Prince. Bel is in for a Battle he'll never forget!

episodes.name: Theater of the Abyss! Bel vs Valt! (2)
To the Skies! World Domination! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel drags others to BC Sol and Free De La Hoya to Battle the strongest Bladers. Bel will need all the help he can get. Can the Dark Prince accept help from his friends?

episodes.name: The Other Valtryek! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel's unruly antics cost him some training privileges at El Astro. With another Battle around the corner, he's gotta find a way to help Belfyre unleash its true strength!

episodes.name: Flipping the Script! Belfyre vs Fafnir! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel comes up with a new tactic against Free, but will it be enough to defeat the Blading legend? Bashara doubts he'll ever be strong enough to defeat the Dark Prince.

episodes.name: Flipping the Script! Belfyre vs Fafnir! (2)
Dragon's Howl! Roar Balkesh! (1)
episodes.overview: Bashara challenges Bel to a battle and his newfound courage takes the group by surprise. Rashad and Valt also go head-to-head, but are they both using Salvage Valtryek?

episodes.name: Lift Off! The Great Aerial Tour! (1)
episodes.overview: Valt prepares the Great Aerial Tour! With Wakiya's help, they travel across the world to battle great Bladers! But, Bel's upgraded Belfyre has been behaving erratically in battles.

episodes.name: Lift Off! The Great Aerial Tour! (2)
Novas Collide! Bel vs Rashad! (1)
episodes.overview: The Great Aerial Tour continues on to its second destination, but only one Blader will battle this legend! A mystery challenger hopes to test the mettle of the Dark Prince.

episodes.name: The Dark Prince Strikes! Bel vs Free! (1)
episodes.overview: The rules say Rashad will face the Blading legend, Free. But, Bel is desperate to prove the strength of Belfyre's S-Gear upgrades and he challenges Free! Can Rashad forgive Bel?

episodes.name: The Dark Prince Strikes! Bel vs Free! (2)
Dark Prince One Day! Minion the Next! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel and Ilya sneak away to have an unsanctioned battle with unusual terms. After getting intel on Lui's evolved Lúinor, Bel is inspired to work on an enhancement for Belfyre!

episodes.name: Dark Prince One Day! Minion the Next! (2)
Knight of Dragons! Guilty Lúinor! (1)
episodes.overview: Ilya feels confident after scoring a point against the Lui Shirosagi. Can she pull out any more tricks? Meanwhile, Bel completes the L-Gear and believes Belfyre can beat anything.

episodes.name: MVP! Great Aerial Tour's Landing! (1)
episodes.overview: The Great Aerial Tour is coming to an end with a final twist from Wakiya! With wins against the world's Blading legends, will the Dark Prince get the coveted MVP title?

episodes.name: The Dark Prince Returns! Devastate Belfyre! (1)
episodes.overview: After a crushing defeat, Bel shuts himself away in Phantom's Gate. While the Dark Prince hides in solitude, Bashara, Ilya, and Rashad climb the ranks of the Blading world.

episodes.name: The Dark Prince Returns! Devastate Belfyre! (2)
Ring of Light! Glory Regnar! (1)
episodes.overview: Rashad's ascension to "High Prince" begins with an intense battle against Valt. Inspired by the battle, the Dark Prince challenges Rashad himself.

episodes.name: Reversal! Reversal! Great Counterattack! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel wants to go head-to-head with Rashad, but this is a Team Battle! If he, Valt and Ranzo are to succeed, Bel must put aside his desire to defeat Rashad himself.

episodes.name: Disbanded! The Dark Prince Goes Rogue?! (1)
episodes.overview: Bel and Valt both want a shot at Rashad, but Rashad has challenged Valt directly! With the showdown against the High Prince approaching, how will the team make their choice?

episodes.name: Disbanded! The Dark Prince Goes Rogue?! (2)
Regnar's Wrath! Glory Pendulum! (1)
episodes.overview: Valt may be winning against Rashad, but it looks like Valtryek is damaged from a previous match! Battling with Bey could lead to defeat, but what other options does Valt have?

episodes.name: Reckless Panic! Bag of Tricks! (1)
episodes.overview: After losing a match to Valt, Bel succeeds in improving his launch power. This newfound ability enables the unveiling of a new Blading club set to be captained by an old rival.

episodes.name: Rekindled Flames! Prominence Phoenix! (1)
episodes.overview: Phelix Payne challenges Ilya and Bashara to a 2-on-1 match. Phelix's true target is the High Prince. If he's taking down Rashad's allies and rivals, who could be next on his list?

episodes.name: Scarlet Flurry! Prominence Shaker! (1)
episodes.overview: Rashad watches Phelix and Phoenix take on foe after foe. Phelix comes face-to-face with the Dark Prince. Bel has witnessed Phelix's power before, but will that give him an edge?

episodes.name: Disturbing Disturbance! Phantom's Gate! (1)
episodes.overview: Phelix and the High Prince have changed. Just as tensions are ready to burst, Valt and Wakiya organize a tri-Blader tournament where all scores can be settled.

episodes.name: Ultimate Collision! Devastation and Ring of Light! (1)
episodes.overview: As the winner of the first round of the tri-Blader showdown, Bel Daizora gets to pick his next opponent. Just one more win and the Dark Prince will be crowned champion.

episodes.name: Ultimate Collision! Devastation and Ring of Light! (2)
Prince vs Prince! Darkness and Light! (1)
episodes.overview: Each Blader has one win apiece and that means that whoever wins next, wins all! Is it time for Bel and the High Prince to settle their rivalry once and for all?

episodes.name: Prince vs Prince! Darkness and Light! (2)

6.name: QuadDrive
6.overview: A tenacious boy hijacks the World Beyblade Battle Association's broadcast to challenge every Beyblader to battle him in the Dynamic Battle System.

episodes.name: Thunder and Lightning! Elemental Power!
episodes.overview: The Grand Masquerade Bey Tournament is here! Bladers have gathered at a mysterious "Power Spot", overflowing with elemental energy. Bel faces off with the masked Blader Quadra.

episodes.name: The Rebirth! Divine Belfyre!
episodes.overview: Bel can't get the mysterious masked Blader off his mind. When he's facing Ranzo, Bel sees Quadra. This doesn't sit right with Ranzo, who threatens to exit the Theater of the Abyss.

episodes.name: Rise Up! Gambit Dragon Soars!
episodes.overview: World-class Blader and loveable goofball, Dante Koryu, has arrived at Phantom's Gate to challenge the Dark Prince. Pax has ordered Quadra to battle Bel once again.

episodes.name: Depths Below! Abyssal Tournament!
episodes.overview: Pri and Hanna have a sleepover at the Suiro house. Hanna's excited to tell Pri all about her family. Pri finds a special Blading delivery from her brother overseas.

episodes.name: Dragon vs Pandora! Rising Tides!
episodes.overview: Pri removes her mask to reveal herself as the enigmatic Quadra. Pax tells Pri to keep her mask on while battling or else risk ruining their research data.

episodes.name: Howls of Terror! Kerbeus Returns!
episodes.overview: Bel, Ranzo and Hanna find a puppet show that offers a Bey tournament! Bel and Ranzo go up against a three-headed guard dog and Pri handles being both a puppeteer and a Blader.

episodes.name: Theater of the Dark Prince! Monstrous Missions!
episodes.overview: Ken has a bunch of training exercises for Bel, Ranzo and Pri that will hone their skills for both puppetry as well as Blading! And when training's over, it's time to Battle!

episodes.name: Peerless! Xiphoid Xcalius!
episodes.overview: Valt offers anyone to face off with his super-powerful friend. So, Bel, Pri and Ranzo go to the Shakadera family dojo just as the mystery Blader completes a 300 Blader challenge.

episodes.name: Striking Flames! Ferocious Battle!
episodes.overview: Can Bel, Pri and Ranzo keep up with the Shakadera training regimen? It's time to face Xander in a one-on-one battle! Ranzo is confident that he has got what it takes.

episodes.name: Dark Devotion! Mighty Sword!
episodes.overview: The Bladers take a quick snack break. Jiji comes to the rescue with his signature scrumptious feast. Xander presents Bel with a challenge over who gets Jiji to stay with them.

episodes.name: Surge Ahead! Battle Camp Clash!
episodes.overview: Bel, Ranzo and Pri have been invited to Battle Island, where rookie Bladers gather to train and compete! They meet a pair of brothers named Hikaru and Hyuga Hizashi.

episodes.name: Hurricane Winds! Twister Pandora!
episodes.overview: Training at the battle camp is hard, and some Bladers have more trouble following Wakiya's rules than others. Bel goes off script, declaring a rematch with his new rival Hyuga.

episodes.name: Tag-Team! Break the Limit!
episodes.overview: It's the climax of Wakiya's battle camp. The assembled Bladers participate in a Tag-Team tournament! The Hizashi brothers are skilled at Battling as a team, but others aren't.

episodes.name: Turbo Time! Zeal Achilles!
episodes.overview: Aiger Akabane has arrived at Phantom's Gate! Aiger has no choice but to test out the new Achilles on the Dark Prince. There's a condition: Bel will have to join forces with Pri!

episodes.name: Chivalry Unbound! Whirl Knight!
episodes.overview: Skilled Bladers from all over the globe were chosen to compete in the Champion's Challenge Tournament, including Valt's fellow BC Sol Blader, Kit Lopez.

episodes.name: Wild Dash! Battle Marathon!
episodes.overview: The Champion's Challenge Tournament keeps on spinning, but one important face is missing: the Dark Prince is nowhere to be seen!

episodes.name: Blazing Battles! Aether Stadium!
episodes.overview: Something monumental was found hidden deep beneath the Grand Masquerade Bey Tournament's stage and it might just change the face of Blading forever.

episodes.name: Darkness Unleashed! Winds of Change!
episodes.overview: It's the final stage of the Champion's Challenge, and the pressure is on when Pax gives Pri some strict instructions on how to use Pandora.

episodes.name: Champion's Challenge! Radiant Finals!
episodes.overview: Everyone has something to prove when Kit and Bel are set to face off for the chance to challenge Aiger!

episodes.name: Invincible Shadows! Aiger vs Bel!
episodes.overview: Bel has climbed his way to the top and earned the right to challenge Aiger for a chance to become the world champion. Beys and Elements will collide in this epic title match!

episodes.name: Dire Destiny! Ruin Pandemonium!
episodes.overview: Pax Forsythe has returned to the Blading stage with a vengeance and a new Bey. Inspired by his loss against Aiger, Bel has evolved Belfyre into something stronger than ever before.

episodes.name: Shining Stars! Lodestar Battle Tournament!
episodes.overview: Wakiya's new Lodestar Battle Tournament has everything expected of a Beyblade competition, but figuring out who will get to enter will be a challenge in and of it itself!

episodes.name: Vroom-vroom Revolution! A Hero's Journey!
episodes.overview: The Hizashi brothers vroom-vroom their way into the Lodestar Battle Tournament! Facing evolved forms of Valtryek and Belfyre, will they be able to overcome the odds?

episodes.name: Achilles vs Pandemonium! Clashes of Light!
episodes.overview: Aiger faces off against Pax in the the Lodestar Battle Tournament. As the battle rages on, Pax’s desperation and obsession starts to make Shu and some of the other legends nervous.

episodes.name: Resonance vs Elemental!
episodes.overview: Pri just can’t believe what Pax is willing to do to unleash the greatest elemental power possible. With the help of the Dark Prince, Pri takes her launch power to new heights.

episodes.name: Elemental Battle! Ultimate Showdown!
episodes.overview: Bel’s preparing for his semi-final match against Pax, and this fierce battle is sure to remind everyone why they love Blading!

7.name: QuadStrike
7.overview: The stage is set for a masquerade tournament, but the Dark Prince isn’t the only belle at this ball! Enter: the masked Blader known as ‘Quadra’. Wielding her elemental Bey, Lightning Pandora, Quadra has defeated every foe to come her way. Meanwhile, Quadra’s brother, Pax, is busy studying the elemental powers radiating from a series of mysterious ruins nearby. Bel might be the Dark Prince, but this adventure is full of even darker secrets!
